text: id | date_iso | title | summary | category | source | url id: evt-2025-09-08-amazon-bedrock-evolution | date_iso: 2025-09-08 | title: Amazon updates Bedrock and scales foundation model tooling | summary: AWS enhanced Bedrock with enterprise features: latency-optimized tiers, hybrid routing, RAG connectors, observability for hallucination and token economics, and compliance tools. Prebuilt agents target contract review, support and code pipelines. The changes lower prototype-to-production friction and give IT stronger governance and cost controls. | category: Cloud / AI | source: Amazon Web Services | url: https://aws.amazon.com/bedrock/2025-updates id: evt-2025-08-22-nvidia-hgx-and-partner-ecosystem | date_iso: 2025-08-22 | title: NVIDIA expands HGX offerings and partner ecosystem | summary: NVIDIA expanded HGX with I/O and inference throughput improvements, validated stacks and monitoring across racks. Partnerships with hyperscalers and vendors aim to secure supply and reduce integration friction. The expansion supports customers scaling from pilots to sustained training and inference at datacenter scale. | category: Infrastructure / Chips | source: NVIDIA Press | url: https://nvidia.com/hgx/2025
